title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Skills: Designing Science Classes Using Hybrid Educational Escape Games

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more scientific principles (e.g., chemical reaction rates, physics laws) to escape room puzzles.
Learners can propose integration strategies for digital/analog elements when designing hybrid (online+offline) missions.
Learners can complete a science-based escape game scenario within 1 hour through 2-person team activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
